page.title: 20INTERVIEWING MY GRANDPA
page.content: My Grandpa is 81 years old and has lived in the area all his life.He started school at 5,like me,but he stayed at the same school until he was 14.I will leave junior school at 11 and stay at my secondary school until 16 or 18.He went to school at 9am and finished at 4pm. We start at 9am and finish at 3pm.In those days you got the cane if you were naughty. When he left school it was easy to find work,now it is hard. He was paid 8/- for 50 hours work a week.Now you would probably only work 40 hours and earn about Â£120. The main road through the village when he was a boy was gravel and stones. Then it was improved. During the last war the bus only ran through the village once a week. When he was a boy all the work in the fields was done by horses and men,now it is done by machine.
